definition: enemy/to be a match for/to rival/to resist/to withstand
anger against a common enemy (idiom); joined in opposition to the same adversary

sentences.english: On the table, we have decided to work together to deal with heifengshuangsha.
sentences.chinese: 飯桌上，大家同仇敵愾決定一起對付黑風雙煞。

sentences.english: It is more likely to be tumbleweed time around the stands.
sentences.chinese: 這更像是看臺上同仇敵愾的氣氛。
